...DISTURBANCE FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN AND PRODUCE LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA... ...HURRICANE AND TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED FOR PORTIONS  HONDURAS AND NICARAGUA...
 As of 4:00 PM EST Wed Nov 13
 the center of Nineteen was located near 16.2, -79.0

 with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.
